jenes.population

Class Pool.Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • jenes.statistics.StatisticsLogger.LoggableStatistics
      • jenes.population.Pool.Statistics
  • Enclosing class:
    Pool<T extends Chromosome>

    public static final class Pool.Statistics
extends StatisticsLogger.LoggableStatistics
    This class provides some basic statistics regarding the Pool .

    • Field Summary

      static int DEFAULT_MEMORY
